text: Big Brother 2 is the upcoming second season of the Canadian reality television game show Big Brother. It will begin airing on Slice in 2014. The second season was announced on June 5, 2013. ==Pre-season== Casting for Big Brother 2 will begin soon. ==References== ==Other websites== * Slice official site Category:2014 television seasons Category:2010s Canadian television series Category:Big Brother seasons
title: Big Brother Canada (season 2)
